entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
